DOC.brief_summary: To determine safety efficacy inhaled insulin treatment type 1 diabetes
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy & Safety Inhaled Insulin Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis type 1 diabetes least 1 year Nonsmokers prior 6 month BMI le equal 35kg/m2 HbA1c > = 7 % < = 11 % Serum creatinine < = 1.8 mg/dL female subject < = 2.0 mg/dL male subject FEV1 > = 70 % predict , DLco > = 70 % , TLC > = 80 % predicted Maintenance treatment regimen insulin less equal 1.4 iu/kg/day Urine cotinine < = 100 ng/mL History chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , asthma , clinically significant pulmonary disease confirm documented history , pulmonary function test radiologic finding Evidence severe complication diabetes Aminotransferase and/or alanine aminotransferase > 3 time upper limit normal
